程序包 net.minecraftforge.fml.client.config

类 GuiUnicodeGlyphButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiButton
        • net.minecraftforge.fml.client.config.GuiButtonExt
          • net.minecraftforge.fml.client.config.GuiUnicodeGlyphButton
  • public class GuiUnicodeGlyphButton
extends GuiButtonExt
    This class provides a button that shows a string glyph at the beginning. The glyph can be scaled using the glyphScale parameter.
    作者:
    bspkrs
